name: Feature Request
about: Suggest an enhancement or new feature
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
A clear description of the feature you'd like.

## Use Case
Describe the problem this would solve or the workflow it would improve.

## Proposed Solution
If you have ideas on how this could work, describe them here.

## Alternatives Considered
Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Additional Context
Any other information, screenshots, or examples that would help explain the request.
